on reading compounds: 災害【サイガイ】calamity, disaster, misfortune
災難【サイナン】calamity, misfortune, disaster
労災【ロウサイ】work-related injury, work-related illness, work-related death, on-the-job accident, workers' compensation insurance
防災【ボウサイ】prevention of damage resulting from a natural disaster, protection against disaster
kun reading compounds: 災い【わざわい】calamity, catastrophe, misfortune
災いする【わざわいする】to be the ruin of (a person)
